channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft Corporation -- Microsoft SharePoint Server
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft Corporation -- Microsoft SharePoint Server

item.title: CVE-2018-0789|2024-09-16T17:38:50.350Z -- microsoft%20corporation -- microsoft%20sharepoint%20server
item.description: Microsoft SharePoint Foundation 2010, Microsoft SharePoint Server 2013 and Microsoft SharePoint Server 2016 allow an elevation of privilege vulnerability due to the way web requests are handled, aka "Microsoft SharePoint Elevation of Privilege Vulnerability". This CVE is unique from CVE-2018-0790.

item.title: CVE-2017-8629|2024-09-16T20:37:05.758Z -- microsoft%20corporation -- microsoft%20sharepoint%20server
item.description: Microsoft SharePoint Server 2013 Service Pack 1 allows an elevation of privilege vulnerability when it fails to properly sanitize a specially crafted web request to an affected SharePoint server, aka "Microsoft SharePoint XSS Vulnerability".
